workflow.name: Automated Workflow Backup System with Google Drive, Gmail and Discord Alerts'
workflow.description:
This workflow automatically backs up all your n8n workflows to a Google Drive folder every day at 1:30 AM.

1. Scheduled Start: Runs daily.
Fetch Workflows: Gets all your n8n workflows.
2. Process Each: Goes through each workflow one by one.
3. Backup Action: Triggers a separate process to save each workflow.
4. Google Drive Setup: You MUST provide your Google Drive backup folder URL in the "Parameters" node.
5. Check Existing: Looks if a backup of the current workflow already exists in your Google Drive folder.
6. Update or New: Either updates the existing backup or creates a new one in Google Drive.
7. Single Success Alert: Sends one email and Discord message after all backups are done successfully. Remember to update your email and Discord details.
8. Failure Alert: Sends an email if any backup fails. Update the recipient email if needed.

Before using, configure your Google Drive folder URL in the "Parameters" node!

parameters.content: ={{ $now.format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') }} Google Drive workflow backup success.

3.  **Set Email:** Update the 'Gmail' nodes with your recipient email address.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.
